lead_paragraph: Now here's a bit of news we presume Whoopi Goldberg won't walk out on. The coming Broadway production of "Sister Act," the musical adapted from her hit 1992 comedy, has found its lead, and to those of you who were hoping the New York transfer would retain the star of its original West End production, your faith has been rewarded.
snippet: Ms. Miller was nominated for an Olivier Award for playing Deloris Van Cartier in the original West End production of the musical.

headline.main: And Then There Was Nun: Patina Miller Will Star in 'Sister Act' on Broadway

abstract: Ms. Miller was nominated for an Olivier Award for playing Deloris Van Cartier in the original West End production of the musical.
